original_text: I suggest that you ask God to help you. You should tell him about your problems. I suggest that you ask God to help you.
korean_text: 나라면 하나님을 찾겠고 내 일을 하나님께 의탁하리라

sentences.original_text: I suggest that you ask God to help you
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 너에게 하나님께 도움을 구하라고 제안한다

sentences.original_text: You should tell him about your problems
sentences.korean_translation: 너는 그에게 너의 문제들에 대해 말해야 한다

sentences.original_text: I suggest that you ask God to help you
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 너에게 하나님께 도움을 구하라고 제안한다
